title: Intake & Role Passport
subtitle: The standard setter
verificationFocus: Lock in explicit must-haves, dealbreakers, and binary screening criteria before a single candidate is sourced.
whatAIDoes: Runs a Preflight Check for conflicts, missing evidence, unclear must-haves, location gaps.
Converts hiring manager input into a tight Role Passport v1.0.
Generates a calibration pack: 3 "yes profiles" + 3 "no profiles" for fast team alignment.
agentBehavior: Won't proceed until must-haves and dealbreakers are explicit.
Forces binary decisions on every requirement.
teamAdvantage: You stop wasting sourcing hours on roles that are not truly defined.
metrics: Time from intake to first credible shortlist

title: JD & Attraction
subtitle: Precision over poetry
verificationFocus: Confirm every JD claim translates to observable, testable behavior — no vague language passes through.
whatAIDoes: Rewrites JDs into candidate-first format with clear outcomes and realistic scope.
Creates an internal hiring brief.
Produces a "truth version" — what the job actually is day-to-day.
agentBehavior: Flags vague phrases like "fast-paced" or "self-starter" and demands translation into observable behavior.
teamAdvantage: Better applicant quality and fewer mismatched screens.

title: Market & Competitor Reality Check
subtitle: Your Moneyball edge
verificationFocus: Separate verified market data from assumptions and mark what still needs validation.
whatAIDoes: Generates a sourcing strategy by country/market — where talent actually sits, title mapping, likely comp bands.
Creates a risk memo explaining why this role will be hard or easy.
agentBehavior: Separates facts from assumptions.
Marks what needs validation.
teamAdvantage: You go to stakeholders with a reality-based plan, not hope.

title: Sourcing Blueprint
subtitle: Turn craft into repeatable
verificationFocus: Validate that the scoring rubric and target list align with the locked-in must-haves from Stage 1.
whatAIDoes: Builds Boolean strings + variants.
Creates a target list with companies, adjacent industries, and bridge profiles.
Produces a profile scoring rubric for shortlist consistency.
Audits sourcing lanes for diversity blind spots and pipeline depth gaps.
agentBehavior: After 20–30 profiles reviewed, updates the blueprint with what’s working and what’s not.
Flags when pipeline depth falls below contingency thresholds.
teamAdvantage: New sourcers ramp faster. Sourcing becomes a system, not an art form.

title: Outreach & Engagement
subtitle: Where most teams waste effort
verificationFocus: Tag every outreach message with an angle code so reply rates produce measurable, verifiable signal.
whatAIDoes: Crafts 3 message angles per persona — mission/outcome hook, craft/mastery hook, career-trajectory hook.
Writes follow-ups that add value, not "just bumping this."
agentBehavior: Tags each message with an Angle Code for reply rate measurement.
Enforces tone rules — short, direct, no recruiter fluff.
teamAdvantage: Outreach becomes testable and improvable, not random.

title: Recruiter Screen
subtitle: Structured signal extraction
verificationFocus: Capture evidence for every must-have, separate it from interpretation, and flag what is still missing.
whatAIDoes: Generates screen scripts aligned to must-haves.
Produces real-time note structuring separating evidence from interpretation.
Flags red flags and identifies candidate motivators.
Drafts empathetic, brand-positive rejection messages for candidates not advancing.
agentBehavior: After the call, outputs hire/no-hire recommendation, confidence score with reasons, and missing evidence list.
Ensures every screened candidate receives a personalized response within 48 hours.
teamAdvantage: Screening quality becomes consistent across the team.

title: Submission & HM Prep
subtitle: Make the HM say yes faster
verificationFocus: Block submission unless every claim has proof attached and every known risk has a mitigation plan.
whatAIDoes: Writes a one-page candidate narrative with match to must-haves, risks, mitigations.
Generates HM briefing questions so the HM tests the right things.
Tracks silver medalists — strong candidates not selected — for future pipeline reuse.
agentBehavior: Blocks submission if key evidence is missing, or labels unknowns clearly.
Flags strong non-selected candidates for silver medalist tracking.
teamAdvantage: Higher pass-through to HM interview. Less back-and-forth.

title: Interview Loop Design
subtitle: Reduce chaos, increase signal
verificationFocus: Ensure each interviewer tests a distinct competency with anchored scoring — no duplicated or unstructured questions.
whatAIDoes: Converts competencies into structured interview plans, consistent question banks, and scorecards with strong/okay/weak anchors.
Creates interviewer-specific guidance.
Audits interview loops for structural bias, accessibility barriers, and inclusive design.
agentBehavior: Detects duplicated questions across interviewers and fixes the loop.
Flags questions that test format performance rather than actual competency.
teamAdvantage: Cleaner signal, faster decisions, fewer false negatives.

title: Debrief & Decision
subtitle: Where bias and vibes sneak in
verificationFocus: Force every hiring opinion into observable evidence — flag vibe language and surface contradictions between interviewers.
whatAIDoes: Summarizes notes into evidence matrix per competency, surfaces contradictions between interviewers, and produces decision options with tradeoffs.
Generates "What would change my mind?" triggers.
Composes post-interview rejection messages with specific, growth-oriented feedback.
agentBehavior: Flags "vibe language" and forces translation into observable evidence.
Ensures rejected candidates receive evidence-based feedback within 48 hours of the decision.
teamAdvantage: Decisions become defensible. Fewer regret hires.

title: Offer & Close
subtitle: Conversion engineering
verificationFocus: Verify candidate motivators against offer terms and document loss reasons with structured codes for every decline.
whatAIDoes: Builds an Offer Mini Evidence Pack with top motivators, likely objections, and counters.
Produces a close plan timeline.
Assigns Loss Reason Code for declines.
Builds structured negotiation playbooks for counter-offers, competing offers, and term adjustments.
agentBehavior: Enforces single-CTA messaging and clean next steps.
Pre-empts counter-offers with data-driven retention statistics before candidate gives notice.
teamAdvantage: Higher acceptance rate plus reusable learning from declines.

title: Preboarding & Compliance
subtitle: The silent failure zone
verificationFocus: Confirm every compliance item is tracked with deadlines and escalation triggers — no undocumented gaps between offer and start.
whatAIDoes: Generates candidate-facing "what happens next" messages.
Creates internal checklists and nudges for documents, background checks, start readiness.
agentBehavior: Alerts on stalling risks — delays, missing documents, unclear start dates.
teamAdvantage: Fewer drop-offs between offer and start.

title: Postmortem & Continuous Improvement
subtitle: The compounding loop
verificationFocus: Require verified learning entries per role and update templates based on measured stage bottleneck data, not anecdotes.
whatAIDoes: Runs monthly pipeline autopsy — where candidates drop and why, outreach angles that win, stage bottlenecks.
Updates Role Passport templates, sourcing blueprints, screen rubrics, and close playbooks.
agentBehavior: Requires 3 learning entries per role, even if it was easy.
teamAdvantage: You get better every month while others stay flat.

feedbackLoops.label: Update Role Passport
feedbackLoops.trigger: When postmortem reveals recurring requirement misalignment, update the Role Passport template and must-have criteria.

feedbackLoops.label: Refine Sourcing Blueprint
feedbackLoops.trigger: When postmortem shows sourcing channels underperforming, update the sourcing plan lanes and target company list.

feedbackLoops.label: Calibrate Screen Rubric
feedbackLoops.trigger: When late-stage failures trace back to screening gaps, tighten the Truth Check evidence questions and scoring anchors.

feedbackLoops.label: Adjust Outreach Angles
feedbackLoops.trigger: When decline reasons cluster around motivation or role mismatch, revise outreach messaging and angle codes.
